Package index

Description

anthrocheckr-package anthrocheckr
An Implementation of Anthropometric Measurement Standardisation Tests

Summary

calculate_mean() calculate_sd() calculate_max()
Calculate the mean, sd and maximum difference value of measurements/observations

Calculate

calculate_coeff_r()
Calculate the coefficient of reliability (R).
calculate_relative_tem()
Calculate relative TEM of measurements by multiple observers.
calculate_team_tem()
Calculate technical error of measurement (TEM) for two or more observers
calculate_tem()
Calculate technical error of measurement (TEM)
calculate_tem_cohort()
Calculate intra-observer TEM for each observer
calculate_total_tem()
Calculate the Total TEM given individual intra-observer TEM.
estimate_bias()
Calculate bias of a measurement

Shiny app

run_anthrocheckr()
Run the anthrocheckr Shiny app

Datasets

smartStd
Standardisation test data - sample 1
smartStdLong
Standardisation test data - sample 2
smartWide
Standardisation test data - sample 3
stature
Example dataset from *Ulijaszek and Kerr (1999)* containing repeat measurements of stature `m` carried out by four observers on ten subjects.
liberiaStdData
Dataset from a standardisation exercise done in Liberia in preparation for a coverage survey.
